text: In summary , we demonstrated that eEF1A interacts with NS5A and negatively modulates the CSFV growth . The possible mechanism of the negative effect of eEF1A on the CSFV growth is that eEF1A interacts with the CSFV IRES and inhibits its activity . Further studies are needed to define the detailed interplay among eEF1A , NS5A and IRES in the life cycle of CSFV .
